user_stories.action: I want to create a new AES shipment filing by entering all required export information electronically
user_stories.benefit: so that I can comply with U.S. export regulations and declare my shipment to CBP.
related_functionality: Create new export shipment filings with all required data elements.
Populate and manage standard shipment header information (e.g., reference numbers, dates, parties involved).

user_stories.action: I want to create a new AES shipment filing on behalf of my client (the exporter)
user_stories.benefit: so that I can fulfill my service obligations and ensure their shipment meets compliance requirements.
related_functionality: Create new export shipment filings with all required data elements.
Populate and manage standard shipment header information (e.g., reference numbers, dates, parties involved).

user_stories.action: I want to transmit the completed AES shipment filing data directly to CBP AES
user_stories.benefit: so that I can receive an Internal Transaction Number (ITN) confirming acceptance and proceed with the export.
related_functionality: Transmit shipment data to CBP AES.

user_stories.action: I want to transmit the completed AES shipment filing data to CBP AES for my client
user_stories.benefit: so that their export declaration is submitted promptly and they receive the necessary ITN.
related_functionality: Transmit shipment data to CBP AES.

user_stories.action: I want to modify a previously accepted AES filing using 'Replace' or 'Change' actions
user_stories.benefit: so that I can correct errors or update shipment details (like port of export or value) as required by regulations.
related_functionality: Modify previously accepted shipments (e.g., change port of export) using 'Replace' or 'Change' actions.
Transmit shipment data to CBP AES.

user_stories.action: I want to modify a previously accepted AES filing for my client
user_stories.benefit: so that I can ensure the accuracy of the filed information and maintain compliance on their behalf.
related_functionality: Modify previously accepted shipments (e.g., change port of export) using 'Replace' or 'Change' actions.
Transmit shipment data to CBP AES.

user_stories.action: I want to cancel a previously accepted AES filing
user_stories.benefit: so that I can inform CBP that the planned export is no longer occurring and avoid potential compliance issues.
related_functionality: Cancel previously accepted shipments.
Transmit shipment data to CBP AES.

user_stories.action: I want to cancel a previously accepted AES filing for my client
user_stories.benefit: so that CBP records accurately reflect the cancellation of the export shipment.
related_functionality: Cancel previously accepted shipments.
Transmit shipment data to CBP AES.

user_stories.benefit: so that I can fulfill the necessary filing requirements as per regulations when I am responsible for the declaration.
